title: Rams vs Packers live stream: how to watch NFL online from anywhere
author: aatif-sulleyman
summary: Aaron Rodgers takes on Aaron Donald at a freezing Lambeau
article: Switching that golden West Coast sun for a freezing Sunday night in Wisconsin is probably most Californians' idea of hell, and the Packers will be looking to use the icy conditions to their advantage against a Rams team that's well overdue a rebound. Read on as we explain how to get a Rams vs Packers live stream and watch the NFL game online from anywhere.

Both teams have endured recent slipups, but while the Packers more or less have ownership of the NFC North, the Rams have lost ground to the NFC West-leading Cards, and are still in the sights of the 49ers.
Sean McVay's men have been on the wrong end of two consecutive blowouts, an embarrassing turn of events for such a talent-stacked roster.
Aaron Donald and Von Miller will be frothing at the mouth to get at Aaron Rodgers, for whom the signs look ominous due to the absence of All-Pro tackle David Bakhtiari with a knee injury.

And Robert Woods' season-ending injury firmly opens the door to fellow superstar recruit Odell Beckham, who needs to show he's no spent force. Follow our guide for how to watch the Rams vs Packers online and get an NFL live stream wherever you are in the world right now.

If you've mismatched a holiday or you're away on business and you want to watch your country's coverage from abroad, then you'll need to use a VPN. This will help you dial in to a location back in your home country to avoid geo-blocks and regain access to the content and services you already pay for back home.
A VPN is generally perfect for this as it allows you to change your IP address so you appear to be in a completely different location when the big game is on.
Use a VPN to live stream Rams vs Packers from anywhere
